turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like make an order for pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! Where did you have in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, how many pizzas did you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what kind of pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do 1 pepperoni with Extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what about the other one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For that one, let's make it a meat lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, did you want Hut Favorite crust for both of those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want extra cheese on the second pizza also?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. Just finish my order as is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Just give me a second to finalize your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure thing!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your total comes out to about $25. Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, this sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your pizza should be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good! Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, enjoy your food!
